name: Brain Zaps
description:
This piece is part of a series of mine (Chaotic Mind , 2022).

-

"The world was a blur. Colors mixed together in a chaotic mess, and sounds were a jumbled mess of indistinguishable noise. Time was meaningless, and space was nonexistent. There was only the chaos. The mind was a chaotic mess, and confusion ruled supreme."

-

Abstract light-painting created with steel wool on fire in pitch darkness. It was complemented by digital art.

*

'Brain Zaps', 2022
